amendment.description: Amendment prohibits defense contractors from using Federal funds for political advocacy. \ The amendment was subsequently rejected on a separate vote in the full House. See Roll No. 645.
amendment.purpose: An amendment preprinted in the Congressional Record of September 6 as amendment No. 85, to prohibit defense contractors from using Federal funds to lobby government agencies; and prohibits contractors from using more than 5% of their own funds on lobbying or political activities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schroeder amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Mr. Skaggs demanded a separate vote on the Schroeder amendment (A022).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schroeder amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 238 (Roll no. 645).
